custom-sql.sql:
SELECT contactsdepartmentproperty.companyId, contactsdepartmentproperty.groupId, contactsdepartmentproperty.userId, contactsdepartmentproperty.userName, contactsdepartmentproperty.propertyId, contactsdepartmentproperty.departmentId, contactsdepartmentproperty.propertyKey, contactsdepartmentproperty.propertyValue, contactsdepartmentproperty.propertyType, contactsdepartmentproperty.createDate, contactsdepartmentproperty.modifiedDate
FROM contactsdepartmentproperty
WHERE (contactsdepartmentproperty.propertyKey = ?)
AND (contactsdepartmentproperty.groupId = ?)
AND (contactsdepartmentproperty.departmentId = ?)
ORDER BY contactsdepartmentproperty.propertyKey ASC
